import React, { useState } from 'react'; import {Link} from "react-router-dom"; import { Collapse, Navbar, NavbarToggler, NavbarBrand, Nav, NavItem, NavLink, UncontrolledDropdown, DropdownToggle, DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, Form, Input } from 'reactstrap'; import './TopMenu.css' import cart from '../img/cart.svg'; import avt from '../img/avt.jpg'; const TopMenu = (props) => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false); const userAvt = props.userAvt || avt; const toggle = () => setIsOpen(!isOpen); return (
BookShop
Login Option 2 Reset
); } export default TopMenu;
